manifest.ext.name: Secrets-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero-Hassle Secrets Detection & Sanitization - Detect and sanitize credentials, tokens, and API keys locally â€” before you commit. GitGuardian-level security without ever sending data off your machine.
manifest.command.detect.title: Detect Secrets
manifest.command.sanitize.title: Sanitize Secrets
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: Secrets-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy detection/sanitization results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: Enable automatic deduplication of detected secrets
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open detection results in a new editor to the side
Detection sensitivity level. Higher sensitivity detects more potential secrets but may increase false positives
Medium - Detect medium and high confidence secrets (default)
High - Detect all potential secrets (may have false positives)
manifest.settings.detection.include.api-: Include API keys in detection (AWS, Azure, GCP, generic)
manifest.settings.detection.include.toke: Include tokens in detection (JWT, OAuth, Bearer, etc.)
manifest.settings.detection.include.priv: Include private keys in detection (SSH, RSA, PGP)
manifest.settings.sanitization.replace-w: Text to use when replacing detected secrets
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn before opening multiple result documents when count exceeds this threshold
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show parse errors as VS Code notifications when parsing fails
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Secrets-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
manifest.settings.performance.max-durati: Maximum allowed operation duration in milliseconds
manifest.settings.performance.max-memory: Maximum allowed memory usage in bytes
manifest.settings.performance.max-cpu.de: Maximum allowed CPU usage in microseconds
runtime.help.title: Secrets-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a file
2. Run "Secrets-LE: Detect Secrets" to scan for secrets
3. Run "Secrets-LE: Sanitize Secrets" to replace them with placeholders
runtime.help.commands:
**Detect**: Scan document for secrets (API keys, tokens, passwords, etc.)
**Sanitize**: Replace detected secrets with safe placeholders
**Settings**: Configure detection sensitivity and options
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No secrets found?** Adjust sensitivity in settings
**Performance issues?** Enable safety settings for large files
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "Secrets-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Detection sensitivity, sanitization placeholder, safety checks
runtime.detect.no-editor: No active editor. Please open a file first.
runtime.detect.none: No secrets detected in this document
runtime.sanitize.no-editor: No active editor. Please open a file first.
runtime.sanitize.confirm: This will replace detected secrets with placeholders. Continue?
runtime.error.parse.suggestion: Check the file format and try again
runtime.error.safety.suggestion: Consider adjusting safety thresholds in settings
runtime.error.performance.suggestion: Consider processing smaller files or adjusting performance settings
runtime.safety.file-size: File size ({0} bytes) exceeds safety threshold ({1} bytes)
runtime.safety.file-size.suggestion: Consider splitting the file or increasing the safety threshold in settings
runtime.safety.output-size: Output size ({0} lines) exceeds safety threshold ({1} lines)
runtime.safety.output-size.suggestion: Consider filtering results or increasing the threshold
